subtitulo: When attempting to transfer to another user, you must use the user ID available in the bot or upon login. This is the same transfer ID.
subtitulo2: If the transfer does not occur, check if the **ID** is valid and that it is not your own (**self-transfers are not allowed, and in this case, nothing will happen**).n/n/Each user has a 10-digit numerical ID. If everything is correct but the transfer still fails, check your connection or whether you are making too many attempts. **Do not overload the system with multiple retries**. Try a few times, and if unsuccessful, try again later or contact support for a detailed resolution.
